trans-unit.source: Provides <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> objects for each state of the left part of a horizontal scroll bar track. This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 为水平滚动条轨道左边部分的每种状态提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> 对象。此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the horizontal scroll bar track to the left of the scroll box (also known as the thumb).
trans-unit.target: 每个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal>类返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>左侧的滚动框 （也称为滚动块） 的水平滚动条轨道的不同状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal.Normal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal.Normal%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarLeftTrackHorizontal1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 处理窗体的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementScrollBarLeftTrackHorizontal1`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a visual style element that represents the left part of a horizontal scroll bar track in the disabled state.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示处于禁用状态的水平滚动条轨道左边部分的视觉样式元素。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> that represents the left part of a horizontal scroll bar track in the disabled state.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" />，它表示处于禁用状态的水平滚动条轨道的左边部分。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal.Disabled%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal.Disabled%2A>属性创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal.Disabled%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。
